name: Cathedral Quarter
description: A religious district centered around a grand temple or cathedral; adventurers can seek spiritual guidance, participate in ceremonies, or investigate religious mysteries.
atmosphere: The sound of bells tolling the hours echoes through the district, mingling with the soft chanting of prayers. The air is thick with the scent of incense and candle wax. Stained glass windows cast colorful shadows on cobblestone streets, and the atmosphere is one of quiet reverence.
